item.title: KENWORTH T660 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 11, 2025

KENWORTH T660 1.53 ETS2

1 cabin with suspension.
1 chassis.
2 interiors.
39 engines options (Cummins engines only in full version).
11 transmissions options.
3 bumper models.
3 sideskirt models.
4 wing models (all models only in full version).
2 sidewing models (all models only in full version).
Stoneguard (only in full version).
Air horn slots.
Hood mirrors.
Side mirror.
4 sunshield models (all models only in full version).
3 fender models.
Skins & template to make your own (only in full version).
Huge solid & metallic colour options (only in full version).
3 Rear bumpers options with license plate light.
A lot of cabin accessories (Recomendded Sis’l Megapack to have all).
Truck in traffic (2 versions. only in full version).
Truck in quick jobs (2 versions. only in full version).
Truck in truck browser (only in full version).
Trailer cables.
Advanced coupling.

Credits: equipe sol

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Mercedes-Benz 1620 2004 6×2 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 11, 2025

Mercedes-Benz 1620 2004 6×2 1.53 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz 1620 2004 6×2 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a classic and reliable Brazilian truck to the game. Featuring high-quality textures, a detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics, this mod enhances the trucking experience. It includes various customization options, multiple chassis configurations, and advanced lighting effects, allowing for full personalization. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for players who enjoy driving classic Mercedes-Benz trucks.

Credits: paulo junior

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

This mod may receive periodic updates for improvements and bug fixes. These updates ensure that the mod remains compatible with updates to the ETS2 base game and continues to enhance the player experience. We may also include new parts and accessories in future updates, but I would like to clarify that we are under no obligation to make these additions on a regular basis.
Compatible with version: 1.52.x and 1.53.x

Credits: paulo junior

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

item.title: STAR 200 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 11, 2025

STAR 200 1.53 ETS2

Scania 200_266 Star This mod includes: The legendary Star 200 by Ekualizer updated by me to version 1.53. We have: 3 cabins: 200-244-266 5 chassis:266_6x2 4×4 traction,244_4x2 4×4 traction,200_4x2,4x4t 4×4 traction,4x2t 4 engines 3 transmissions 2 internal models of which the 266 is purely military. Cabins, bodies and tarpaulins all skinnable. Dedicated tires and rims. Trailers: We have 5 trailers. 1 Bdf 2 lowered with military loads 3 single tarpaulin semi-trailer 4 Power generator that also accelerates loads in the game 5 2-axle trailer The entire mod is based on the military type but you can easily skin everything on the civilian one. Credits: Ekualizer, Antonio62 Baltazar

Credits: Ekualizer, Antonio62 Baltazar

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. item.title: Fiat Fiorino 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 10, 2025

Fiat Fiorino 1.53 ETS2

The Fiat Fiorino mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a compact and versatile light commercial van to the game. Featuring high-quality exterior and interior details, realistic engine sounds, smooth driving physics, and functional dashboard animations, this mod enhances urban and regional delivery experiences. It includes various customization options, multiple paint jobs, and advanced lighting effects, making it a great choice for players who enjoy driving small utility vehicles in ETS2. Fully compatible with ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for Fiat fans and delivery simulation enthusiasts.

Credits: paulo junior

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
